snippet: Gov. Chris Christie of New Jersey appointed the panel after opponents criticized him for not mentioning gun violence in his State of the State address.
abstract: Gov Chris Christie of New Jersey appoints task force to examine gun control measures and school safety issues after facing criticism from opponents for not mentioning gun violence in his State of the State address.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Chris Christie of New Jersey appointed the panel after opponents criticized him for not mentioning gun violence in his State of the State address.

headline.seo: Christie Forms Panel on Guns and School Safety
headline.main: Christie Forms Panel on Firearms and School Safety
headline.print_headline: Christie Forms Panel on Firearms and School Safety
